title: Logo Package Forge – Test Logo Fonts, Lockups & Layouts In Seconds (+40% Discount)

excerpt: Speed up your logo design process with Logo Package Forge — test fonts, layouts & lockups inside Illustrator. Save hours. Get 40% off today with our coupon.
text: We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products—learn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission. Every logo design project starts the same way — finding the perfect font. This usually means leaving your design tool to open up some third-party font app or browsing through Adobe Illustrator’s endless font list. Even more time gets lost trying fonts in a bunch of colors, layouts, and lockups. What if you could streamline this entire process without ever leaving Adobe Illustrator? Logo Package Forge is a powerful new extension for Adobe Illustrator that transforms your logo design workflow by organizing fonts and generating logo variations in seconds. It’s remarkably efficient and saves hours of design time. Keep reading to learn more about this game-changing tool and how to claim your exclusive Logo Package Forge discount. And while you’re here, don’t miss their other time-saving tools: Logo Package Express for exporting logo files (See our review & discount here) Logo Package Swatch for managing brand colors Exclusive Logo Package Forge 40% Discount Get 40% off Logo Package Forge with our exclusive discount coupon code. From May 12-18, 2025. Enter ‘LAUNCH40’ at checkout. Test logo fonts, lockups, and layouts in seconds! Logo Package Forge allows you to test out fonts, layouts, lockups, and spacing directly inside Illustrator. Organize Fonts Directly in Illustrator Tired of sifting through huge font lists and switching apps? Logo Package Forge lets you create custom font sets right inside Illustrator. Sort fonts by client, style, vibe — whatever you need. Generate Fully Editable Logotypes No more manual duplication when you want to see how a logotype looks in 20 different typefaces. Forge automatically generates logos in all your selected fonts — and each one remains editable for easy fine-tuning. Fine-Tuned Scale and Spacing From vertical and horizontal lockups to scale and spacing between your logo elements, Forge helps you control every detail so you can find that perfect balance without slowing down. Stay Organized & Focus on Your Best Ideas    When you’re trying lots of new ideas very quickly, artboards can get super messy. Logo Package Forge automatically arranges your variations in a neat grid. No more losing great ideas under the clutter. What Does Logo Package Forge Look Like? Logo Package Forge is a panel that lives right inside Adobe Illustrator. It’s super straightforward: pick your font set, enter your brand name, add your logo mark, and let Forge generate clean, organized variations in seconds. Logo Package Forge Pricing If you’re ready to supercharge your logo concepting workflow, give Logo Package Forge a try. It lets you test, organize, and refine all your best ideas in a fraction of the time. html:
We independently research, test, review, and recommend the best products—learn more about our process. If you buy something through our links, we may earn a commission.

Every logo design project starts the same way — finding the perfect font.

This usually means leaving your design tool to open up some third-party font app or browsing through Adobe Illustrator’s endless font list. Even more time gets lost trying fonts in a bunch of colors, layouts, and lockups.

What if you could streamline this entire process without ever leaving Adobe Illustrator?

Logo Package Forge is a powerful new extension for Adobe Illustrator that transforms your logo design workflow by organizing fonts and generating logo variations in seconds. It’s remarkably efficient and saves hours of design time.

Keep reading to learn more about this game-changing tool and how to claim your exclusive Logo Package Forge discount.

And while you’re here, don’t miss their other time-saving tools:

  • Logo Package Express for exporting logo files (See our review & discount here)
  • Logo Package Swatch for managing brand colors

Exclusive Logo Package Forge 40% Discount

Get 40% off Logo Package Forge with our exclusive discount coupon code. From May 12-18, 2025.

Enter ‘LAUNCH40’ at checkout.

Test logo fonts, lockups, and layouts in seconds!

Logo Package Forge allows you to test out fonts, layouts, lockups, and spacing directly inside Illustrator.

Organize Fonts Directly in Illustrator

Tired of sifting through huge font lists and switching apps?

Logo Package Forge lets you create custom font sets right inside Illustrator. Sort fonts by client, style, vibe — whatever you need.

Generate Fully Editable Logotypes

No more manual duplication when you want to see how a logotype looks in 20 different typefaces.

Forge automatically generates logos in all your selected fonts — and each one remains editable for easy fine-tuning.

Fine-Tuned Scale and Spacing

From vertical and horizontal lockups to scale and spacing between your logo elements,

Forge helps you control every detail so you can find that perfect balance without slowing down.

Stay Organized & Focus on Your Best Ideas

  

When you’re trying lots of new ideas very quickly, artboards can get super messy.

Logo Package Forge automatically arranges your variations in a neat grid.

No more losing great ideas under the clutter.

What Does Logo Package Forge Look Like?

Logo Package Forge is a panel that lives right inside Adobe Illustrator.

It’s super straightforward: pick your font set, enter your brand name, add your logo mark, and let Forge generate clean, organized variations in seconds.

Logo Package Forge Pricing

If you’re ready to supercharge your logo concepting workflow, give Logo Package Forge a try.

It lets you test, organize, and refine all your best ideas in a fraction of the time.

  • Organize fonts directly inside of Adobe Illustrator

  • Test your logotype in unlimited font styles

  • Generate multi-line logotype layouts or pair your fonts for unique combinations

  • Test unlimited logo layouts by generating logotype and logo mark lockups

  • Get fine-tuned control over the scale and spacing of your logo concepts

Get 40% off Logo Package Forge with our exclusive discount coupon code. From May 12-18, 2025.

Enter ‘LAUNCH40’ at checkout.

Requires Adobe Illustrator CC 2022 or higher. Available on Mac and Windows.

About Jacob Cass

Jacob Cass is a brand designer & strategist, educator, podcaster, business coach and the founder of JUST Creative, an award-winning branding & design consultancy that doubles as an industry-leading blog. Get in touch.
